lead_paragraph: The American International Group named a new acting head for its Taiwan unit, Nan Shan Life, on Friday, in a move that analysts said paves the way for A.I.G. to sell the unit again following the collapse of an earlier $2.2 billion deal.
snippet: The American International Group named a new acting head for its Taiwan unit, Nan Shan Life, on Friday, in a move that analysts said paves the way for A.I.G. to sell the unit again following the collapse of an earlier $2.2 billion (1.4 billion pound)...

headline.main: New Chief for A.I.G.'s Nan Shan Stokes Sale Talk

abstract: The American International Group named a new acting head for its Taiwan unit, Nan Shan Life, on Friday, in a move that analysts said paves the way for A.I.G. to sell the unit again following the collapse of an earlier $2.2 billion (1.4 billion pound) deal.
